description: Jessy is an astronaut with 10 units of a rare mineral found on Mars. She can send some or all units to Earth for processing by Bob, a scientist. Processed minerals yield triple the original value. Bob then decides how many units to send back to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_none: send 0 units to Earth for processing
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: send 3 units to Earth for processing
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: send all units to Earth for processing

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of processed units to astronaut
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of processed units to astronaut
